tweets.text: Many of these areas are managed by #IDBs dependent on being able to move flood water into our main rivers. @DefraGovUK @hmtreasury need to allocate the right resources to @EnvAgency for routine management & maintenance of these rivers. @MoretonBack1 @JamesBevanEA @johncurtinEA https://t.co/JkAs91AdZa

24th January 2021

1 Meter from the end of the sewage outfall pipe and sewage fungus is clearly visible on the surface of the ground.  This is coming from a single dwelling, a small private domestic sewage system.  This shouldn't be happening!  

Any comments @EnvAgency? https://t.co/vAHR6gW9fI
